DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics multiple ascend dos AZD8848 healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: To Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Multiple Doses AZD8848 Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase 1 , Single Centre , Double-blind , Randomised , Placebo-controlled , Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics Administration Multiple Ascending ( MAD ) Once Weekly Inhaled Doses AZD8848 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture Women must nonchildbearing potential must stable highly effective contraceptive least 3 month prior Screening willing continue choose contraceptive additonal use condom 3 month postdose Male subject willing use barrier contraception ie , condom , first day investigational product administration 3 month last administration investigational product Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 110 kg Women must negative pregnancy test screen admission study centre , must date last menstruation , must lactate must nonchildbearing potential Abnormal vital sign , 10 minute supine rest , define follow : SBP > 140 mmHg , Diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > 90 mmHg , Heart rate < 40 > 85 beat per minute History asthma allergic rhinitis Prolonged QTcF > 450 m shorten QTcF < 340 m family history long QT syndrome History severe allergy/hypersensitivity ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity , judge Investigator history hypersensitivity drug similar chemical structure class AZD8848 Any clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry .
